overview: King Randolph sends for his cousin, Duchess Rowena, to help turn his daughters, Princess Genevieve and her 11 sisters, into better ladies. But the Duchess takes away all the sisters' fun, including their favorite pastime: dancing. Thinking all hope is lost, the sisters find a secret passageway to a magical land where they can dance the night away.
tagline: Enchanted dancing in a magical world!
title: Barbie in The 12 Dancing Princesses
